channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hamas says it will release Israeli American Edan Alexander, held hostage in Gaza
item.description: Edan Alexander, a dual U.S.-Israeli citizen, is the last remaining American citizen held by Hamas in Gaza who is believed to still be alive. President...

item.title: U.S. halts cattle imports from Mexico, citing fears of flesh-eating maggot
item.description: The New World screwworm is endemic in parts of Latin America and the Caribbean — and its northward spread into Mexico has alarmed U.S. officials. It c...

item.title: Qatar is said to be giving Trump a new plane
item.description: The offer, which comes on the eve of Trump's visit to the Middle East, raises major ethical and legal questions.

item.title: U.S. and China cite progress in trade talks but release few details
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said details will be released Monday after a weekend of talks in Switzerland.

item.title: Why Burkina Faso's junta leader has captured hearts and minds around the world
item.description: Capt Ibrahim Traoré, 37, is portraying himself as a champion of pan-Africanism.

item.title: Skull, spine implants helping paralyzed patients walk or move their arms | 60 Minutes

item.title: US and China say substantial progress made in key trade talks
item.description: The US treasury secretary calls the talks "productive" while China's vice premier describes them as "candid".

item.title: Trump prizes more Gulf investment in the US
item.description: As the president goes to Saudi Arabia, Qatar and the UAE he wants them to buy more from the States.

item.title: Hamas to release US-Israeli hostage as part of efforts to reach Gaza ceasefire
item.description: Edan Alexander will be released ahead of President Donald Trump's visit to the Middle East on Tuesday.

item.title: Qatar to donate jet for Trump to use as a presidential plane, sources say
item.description: The gift comes comes as President Trump heads to Qatar as part of his first international trip of his second term.

item.title: Newark Airport suffers third system outage in less than 2 weeks
item.description: Yet another equipment outage at Newark Liberty International Airport​ caused widespread delays on Sunday.

item.title: 5/7: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Vatican City filled with hope and anticipation for new pope; Reporter's Notebook: Who pays for tariffs?

item.title: The rare disease in a remote town where 'almost everyone is a cousin'
item.description: Many children in a Brazil town lost the ability to walk, so one scientist set about discovering why.

item.title: Trump administration fires top copyright official days after firing Librarian of Congress
